Package skywaysolutions.app.utils

Interface IRepairable

All Known Subinterfaces:
ICustomerAccessor, IRateAccessor, ISalesAccessor, IStaffAccessor, IStockAccessor
All Known Implementing Classes:
AccountController, BlankController, CustomerController, RateController, SaleController
public interface IRepairable
This interface provides the ability to get the list of tables to back up and unlock a specified table.
Author:
Alfred Manville

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    assureExistence(String tableName)
    Assures the existence of a table.
    void
    forceFullPurge(String tableName)
    Forces a table to be deleted (Along with its auxiliary table).

    Forces a table to be fully unlocked.

    Gets an array of tables that can be backed up.

    refreshCache(String tableName)
    Refreshes the cache of a table accessor.

  • Method Details

    • getTables

      String[] getTables()
      Gets an array of tables that can be backed up.
      Returns:
      The array of tables.

    • forceFullUnlock

      void forceFullUnlock(String tableName) throws CheckedException
      Forces a table to be fully unlocked.
      Parameters:
      tableName - The table to fully unlock.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The table could not be unlocked.

    • forceFullPurge

      void forceFullPurge(String tableName) throws CheckedException
      Forces a table to be deleted (Along with its auxiliary table).
      Parameters:
      tableName - The table to purge.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The table could not be purged.

    • assureExistence

      void assureExistence(String tableName) throws CheckedException
      Assures the existence of a table.
      Parameters:
      tableName - The table to assure the existence of.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The table could not be assured.

    • refreshCache

      void refreshCache(String tableName) throws CheckedException
      Refreshes the cache of a table accessor.
      Parameters:
      tableName - The name of the table to refresh the cache of.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The table could not be refreshed.
